title: Fortune.st
author: Fortune.st
created_time: January 31, 2023, 11:26:55 AMLast edit: January 31, 2023, 12:54:57 PM by Fortune.st
content: The party is going on at Fortune.st regardless of the coming upgrades. Now is the right time to join the party and cashout big time as we are giving out $5,000 daily to 5 most active players. Don't be left out, signup and and make your first deposit. You also qualify to win from our $1,000,000 prize pot, plus instant $500 and above for deposit of $200 and above.Top 20 Reasons to Play at Fortune.st No KYC Casino Platform    No mandatory personal information required    Quick and easy sign-up process    Anonymous gameplay    No government tracking    Increased security for personal information    No need for identity verification    No requirement for sensitive documents    Selection of (simple easy to play) games    No restrictions on deposits or withdrawals    Fast and secure crypto payment options    No deposit limits    No waiting time for verification    Full privacy protection    No third-party involvement    No geographical restrictions    Complete control over personal information    Increased privacy for financial transactions    No hidden fees    No blocked accounts    Full control over your personal gambling experience

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP I assume you have an announcement thread created here already why not continue with your advertisement and promo there instead of creating new thread. This would amount to Spamming this platform with your numerous post. I will suggest you take this post to your announcement thread so you can keep your activities on track.However, what's up with the new wave of registration deposit bonus. This is amazing though because I have seen such advertisement on many casino announcement thread. I see the competition is high amongst casinos for traffic and membership registration.

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on January 31, 2023, 12:50:59 PMOP I assume you have an announcement thread created here already why not continue with your advertisement and promo there instead of creating new thread. This would amount to Spamming this platform with your numerous post. I will suggest you take this post to your announcement thread so you can keep your activities on track.Thank you for your comment and the concern expressed. However, none of these posts are ANN thread as we know it. The previous thread was to update the community about our ongoing upgrades and things to expect from the incoming new version. While this thread is for the daily giveaways for the most active players. Before this thread was created, the previous one was duly closed since it has achieved its objectives.Quote from: CryptSafe on January 31, 2023, 12:50:59 PMHowever, what's up with the new wave of registration deposit bonus. This is amazing though because I have seen such advertisement on many casino announcement thread. I see the competition is high amongst casinos for traffic and membership registration.That's how it should be. In every legitimate business niche, there is always competition and I think that's a good thing for customers because competition brings out the business in businesses. And you'll agree with me that it's always good to reward loyal customers, competition or not. Don't you think so?

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: First, I would like to welcome you guys to the forum,I must confess that your bonus offers are really tempting, most especially the deposit bonus of getting instant $500 for deposit of $200 and above..I will like to know the details of this bonus, let's assume I deposit $200 right now and earn the $500 bonus, how much must I wager on this casino before I will be able to withdraw?And also, is this $500 bonus withdrawable if I want , or is it an in-casino money that must be spent playing on the casino?

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: No blocked accounts despite of the suspicious transactions? Is this your main thread or a thread to highlight the bonus you’re giving away? The site looks good with their promotions and bonuses, just need to know more about details before trying it and not sure if its worth it to aim for the top 5 most active daily considering the wagering amount of some top gamblers. If this is KYC free and its good.

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on January 31, 2023, 08:45:17 PMFirst, I would like to welcome you guys to the forum,I must confess that your bonus offers are really tempting, most especially the deposit bonus of getting instant $500 for deposit of $200 and above..I will like to know the details of this bonus, let's assume I deposit $200 right now and earn the $500 bonus, how much must I wager on this casino before I will be able to withdraw?And also, is this $500 bonus withdrawable if I want , or is it an in-casino money that must be spent playing on the casino? Thank you Fivestar4everMVP, I appreciate your comment and thanks for welcoming us to Bitcointalk. About the bonus, there is a wagering requirement of 2 times the deposit and bonus amount on a minimum of 2 events each before it's eligible for withdrawal. Other casinos requires 5 times but ours is 2 times only. Both deposit and bonus are withdrawable once you reach the wagering requirement which is very low and easy to meet.Quote from: goaldigger on January 31, 2023, 08:48:51 PMNo blocked accounts despite of the suspicious transactions? Is this your main thread or a thread to highlight the bonus you’re giving away? The site looks good with their promotions and bonuses, just need to know more about details before trying it and not sure if its worth it to aim for the top 5 most active daily considering the wagering amount of some top gamblers. If this is KYC free and its good. We don't suspend or block account except in extreme situations where the user insist on consistently engaging in abusive behaviors. Our aim is to give our users the freedom to play without the fear of their funds being frozen based on flimsy excuses. This thread was created to announce the promotion and bonuses. Our main ANN thread will be in the near future when our ongoing upgrade is completed. We support 100% Anonymous players. I hope I am able to answers your questions to your satisfaction?

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: welcome to the forum, sounds interesting seeing a new casino thread on the forum especially you wrote something there "No accounts blocked", are you sure this method is enough to attract the attention of people who may feel hurt because their account is blocked from some casino, I think you make a difference from other casinos, but I will take a closer look at your casino while waiting for other friends' reviews

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: OP, first of all.... welcome to the forum, hope to see good things coming from you guys in the future. I just have a small question and I hope you can answer this for us. How do we know that the most active people are not some Alt accounts from the casino it self ...that are being used to fool the other people into participating in this? There are always speculation that casinos are using Alt accounts to fake activity and rankings in challenges or bonuses like this. ($150 000 per month are a large sum of money for new startup casinos) This presumably happens more with casinos ..where they have their own in-house games ....and not slots or games from third party game providers.

comments.author: slapper
comments.body: Thank you for joining the forum. This sounds fantastic then! We like non-KYC gaming systems, and Fortune.st's features are undoubtedly grabbing our interest. It's wonderful to know that they place a high value on personal information and privacy, and the simple and speedy sign-up procedure is simply the icing on the cake. Without a doubt, we'll register and participate in the games. We're even more inspired to join the fun at Fortune thanks to the $5,000 daily reward to the most active players. We appreciate you providing this information, and we will definitely check it out!I have this issue, I do not know whether it is because of your website or my IP

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on February 01, 2023, 06:17:03 AMwelcome to the forum, sounds interesting seeing a new casino thread on the forum especially you wrote something there "No accounts blocked", are you sure this method is enough to attract the attention of people who may feel hurt because their account is blocked from some casino, I think you make a difference from other casinos, but I will take a closer look at your casino while waiting for other friends' reviews  Hello Piebayb, thank you for the comment and I want to assure you that we do not lock accounts for flimsy excuses. It is only in extreme and continuous violations that we may consider that option after all other mediation attempts has failed. We warn repeatedly and provide needed assistance where necessary to help the violator/users correct their ways. It is only when all these failed to be complied to that we may consider account blocking as the last resort. So, feel free to game with us, knowing that your account is always safe.Quote from: Kakmakr on February 01, 2023, 06:46:01 AMOP, first of all.... welcome to the forum, hope to see good things coming from you guys in the future. I just have a small question and I hope you can answer this for us. How do we know that the most active people are not some Alt accounts from the casino it self ...that are being used to fool the other people into participating in this? There are always speculation that casinos are using Alt accounts to fake activity and rankings in challenges or bonuses like this. ($150 000 per month are a large sum of money for new startup casinos) This presumably happens more with casinos ..where they have their own in-house games ....and not slots or games from third party game providers.  No brother, we do not participate in our own competitions. We do not engage is such practice as we consider that to be highly unethical. We want to (one day, hopefully soon) attain the highest level in the industry. No one gets to the top and stays there by being dubious from the beginning. At least, we don't want to get to the top through dubious means.Online casinos participating in their own competitions may have some disadvantages, including:    Lack of fairness: As the online casino is organizing the competition, there may be a perception of bias or manipulation in favor of the house.    Limited player pool: If the competition is only open to players of a single online casino, the pool of players may be limited, reducing the excitement and challenge of the competition.    Questionable Prize Distribution: There may be concerns about the transparency and fairness of the prize distribution, as the online casino has control over the outcome.    Trust issues: Online casinos may have a reputation for being untrustworthy, and participating in their own competitions may further damage that reputation.We don't want any of these and therefore will never create Alt accounts to participate in our own competitions. Be rest assured of the fairness of these games. Again, what we are giving out is $5,000 in total. That is 1,000 per day for 5 days for 5 persons. Sorry if the original language was not clear enough.Quote from: slapper on February 01, 2023, 09:33:44 AMThank you for joining the forum. This sounds fantastic then! We like non-KYC gaming systems, and Fortune.st's features are undoubtedly grabbing our interest. It's wonderful to know that they place a high value on personal information and privacy, and the simple and speedy sign-up procedure is simply the icing on the cake. Without a doubt, we'll register and participate in the games. We're even more inspired to join the fun at Fortune thanks to the $5,000 daily reward to the most active players. We appreciate you providing this information, and we will definitely check it out!======I have this issue, I do not know whether it is because of your website or my IP Sorry, it was a temporary slap on our face but that has been quickly corrected. We sincerely apologize for the inconveniences that may have caused.To your first question, the correct reward is total of $5,000 for 5 people. One thousand daily for each person. I will add more context to the original post. And we are looking forward to seeing you at Fortune.st. https://fortune.st/

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: It looks like the gambling platform that you are promoting is quite interesting with lots of bonuses and pretty good features in it.The list of services provided is also very impressiveso that it can make gamblers even more interested in using your platform as a place for them to play. Regarding the absence of blocked accounts, if that's true, then it can attract more attention from gamblers because this service is different from many other casinos.Regarding the bonuses that are given to the 5 most active users, they are taken in the category of being active in a game playing in it or just being active on the platform because if what is categorized is active in playing then we users must have quite a lot of capital to be able to keep playing and expecting the bonus and only those who have a lot of money can get it.

It is a reward for patronage and an opportunity for our most active payers to win extra cash.

comments.body: Please the bonus should not be for only the most popular players on the betting site, I should as well given to the new comers too so as to attract more members on the site.

comments.body: Quote from: uche6215 on February 02, 2023, 10:21:45 AMPlease the bonus should not be for only the most popular players on the betting site, I should as well given to the new comers too so as to attract more members on the site.
